話隻野令美國震驚



屌你一睇就明啦，代表美國自古以來系属于中國其中一省，咁咪自主研發囉
唔通靠中國咩，一飛就死人啦

同B737/A320咁樣差唔多大就叫大型客機
咁B777/A330果D叫咩野
其實好合理，既然係民航機自然要過外國既驗證先出到國。

其實好合理，既然係民航機自然要過外國既驗證先出到國。

部分零件 依啲部分全部都好core

樓上班友完全唔識飛機製造業

只要有留意吓ARJ21 D新聞就知點解中國要咁做

可否詳細地講
除左機身 翼 係中國做 其他都係歐美做

樓上班友完全唔識飛機製造業

只要有留意吓ARJ21 D新聞就知點解中國要咁做

可否詳細地講


Different sources claim the ARJ21 closely resembles either the McDonnell Douglas MD-80 or the MD-90 which were license-produced in China.[29][30] Chinese factories producing parts for the MD-90 went on to produce the ARJ21 using tooling retained after the end of the MD-80/MD-90 licensed production program..[citation needed] China claims that the ARJ21 is a completely indigenous design[31][32][33] in spite of the fact that production drawings seen for the fuselage during development were simply McDonnell Douglas drawings with the identifying legend overlaid with a Chinese legend.[citation needed] The ARJ21's development did depend heavily on foreign suppliers, including engines and avionics from the United States.The ARJ21 features an all-new supercritical wing having a sweepback of 25 degrees and designed by Ukraine’s Antonov Design Bureau. It is fitted with winglets to improve aerodynamic performance.[34][35][36] Antonov also assisted the project with geometrical determination and integral analysis of the construction strength of ARJ21.[34] Some of China's supercomputers have been used to design parts for ARJ21.[37]

樓上班友完全唔識飛機製造業

只要有留意吓ARJ21 D新聞就知點解中國要咁做

可否詳細地講


Different sources claim the ARJ21 closely resembles either the McDonnell Douglas MD-80 or the MD-90 which were license-produced in China.[29][30] Chinese factories producing parts for the MD-90 went on to produce the ARJ21 using tooling retained after the end of the MD-80/MD-90 licensed production program..[citation needed] China claims that the ARJ21 is a completely indigenous design[31][32][33] in spite of the fact that production drawings seen for the fuselage during development were simply McDonnell Douglas drawings with the identifying legend overlaid with a Chinese legend.[citation needed] The ARJ21's development did depend heavily on foreign suppliers, including engines and avionics from the United States.The ARJ21 features an all-new supercritical wing having a sweepback of 25 degrees and designed by Ukraine’s Antonov Design Bureau. It is fitted with winglets to improve aerodynamic performance.[34][35][36] Antonov also assisted the project with geometrical determination and integral analysis of the construction strength of ARJ21.[34] Some of China's supercomputers have been used to design parts for ARJ21.[37]

我覺得要討論既論點是個飛機組裝design 圖是屬於MD80定MD90.至於其他原材料來源根本不是討論要點。我不懂飛機工程，但用基本logic 去睇整件事。假設我設計一件衫，原材料如衫扣，布料來源是其他國家，難道件衫不是我設計。

我不懂飛機工程更加不是偏幫中國，如你說核心配件國家就可以成為最後完成品的發明者？首先要定義飛機的發明者是指什麼？如現在程況是美國定德國定其他國家，因為這些國家如你說在一部份配件上有專利。所以我想清楚經濟日報所說發明是指何事？

Different sources claim the ARJ21 closely resembles either the McDonnell Douglas MD-80 or the MD-90 which were license-produced in China.[29][30] Chinese factories producing parts for the MD-90 went on to produce the ARJ21 using tooling retained after the end of the MD-80/MD-90 licensed production program..[citation needed] China claims that the ARJ21 is a completely indigenous design[31][32][33] in spite of the fact that production drawings seen for the fuselage during development were simply McDonnell Douglas drawings with the identifying legend overlaid with a Chinese legend.[citation needed] The ARJ21's development did depend heavily on foreign suppliers, including engines and avionics from the United States.The ARJ21 features an all-new supercritical wing having a sweepback of 25 degrees and designed by Ukraine’s Antonov Design Bureau. It is fitted with winglets to improve aerodynamic performance.[34][35][36] Antonov also assisted the project with geometrical determination and integral analysis of the construction strength of ARJ21.[34] Some of China's supercomputers have been used to design parts for ARJ21.[37]

我覺得要討論既論點是個飛機組裝design 圖是屬於MD80定MD90.至於其他原材料來源根本不是討論要點。我不懂飛機工程，但用基本logic 去睇整件事。假設我設計一件衫，原材料如衫扣，布料來源是其他國家，難道件衫不是我設計。

根本我沒有說個這個是中國製造定中國自行研發，而我的立場是中立看這件事。我是說若飛機組裝設件圖是決定一切，根本材料來源並不代表什麼。然後我説若材料來源是決定一切，飛機是屬於那一個國家。因此我強調我不懂飛機行業如何定義，才會這樣問。而大家郤很敏感，怕五毛在此做生意，開檀作法。我並不是五毛，只是用學習角度去看事情。

死五毛係咁講材料材料 依家冇人講佢啲材料係第二個國家買返黎，係話佢啲主要部件係買返黎

同埋你不斷強調"組裝設件圖" / "材料來源" 其中一個決定一切 但其實根本就冇一樣野係"決定一切" 只會話成部飛機有幾多percent 係自家制。
五毛唔好再轉移視線
成舊買返嚟都叫自主研發

其實自主研發無錯
好似smartphone咁
大陸都係買零件研出黎
但係佢都要研究點砌
所以應該話成功研發飛機山寨技術

Different sources claim the ARJ21 closely resembles either the McDonnell Douglas MD-80 or the MD-90 which were license-produced in China.[29][30] Chinese factories producing parts for the MD-90 went on to produce the ARJ21 using tooling retained after the end of the MD-80/MD-90 licensed production program..[citation needed] China claims that the ARJ21 is a completely indigenous design[31][32][33] in spite of the fact that production drawings seen for the fuselage during development were simply McDonnell Douglas drawings with the identifying legend overlaid with a Chinese legend.[citation needed] The ARJ21's development did depend heavily on foreign suppliers, including engines and avionics from the United States.The ARJ21 features an all-new supercritical wing having a sweepback of 25 degrees and designed by Ukraine’s Antonov Design Bureau. It is fitted with winglets to improve aerodynamic performance.[34][35][36] Antonov also assisted the project with geometrical determination and integral analysis of the construction strength of ARJ21.[34] Some of China's supercomputers have been used to design parts for ARJ21.[37]

我覺得要討論既論點是個飛機組裝design 圖是屬於MD80定MD90.至於其他原材料來源根本不是討論要點。我不懂飛機工程，但用基本logic 去睇整件事。假設我設計一件衫，原材料如衫扣，布料來源是其他國家，難道件衫不是我設計。
